text: Abdul-Hussein Abdul Redha Abtaan (; born 1 May 1964) is an Iraqi politician who is now the position of the Iraqi Minister of Youth and Sports, he served as deputy governor of Najaf (2005–2009) and deputy in the Iraqi parliament from Najaf (2010–2014) served as the Minister of Youth and Sports in the Iraqi government in 2014. ==See also== *Haider al-Abadi ==References== ==External links== *Ministry of Youth and Sports Category:Iraqi politicians Category:Living people Category:Government ministers of Iraq Category:1964 births Category:Iraqi sociologists Category:Linguists from Iraq Category:People from Najaf
title: Abdul-Hussein Abtaan
